SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 79-米色
留言內容: Super cute shirt. It’s very soft and has a lot of stretch to it, but not too much stretch that it’ll become warped over time, I believe. I love the folded over sleeves, which I usually don’t.  It’s sewn in such a way that it doesn’t seem like a fight with endless wrinkles. The colors also seem accurate to the listing.The design seems screen printed, but in a way that the colors are saturated and soft and not hard in those places, as some screen printing can do. I will be washing it inside out on gentle cycle the first time, just to make sure I don’t ruin it though. If anything changes after I wash it I’ll make sure to update my review.It just so happens that I love sunflowers, so I love the shirt that tiny bit more. Will be looking to buy their other shirts now that I know their quality.

I went with a 2XL and normally wear either a large or x-large depending on the company and/or sizes. So be aware of this if you decide to order this shirt. For reference I am 5'4 and 175 pds. The shirt at first was a bit stiff out of the packaging. However, after a wash it turned really soft and comfortable. The print on it is really pretty, both front and back. Overall I like it but please be aware of the sizing before ordering.

商品名稱: 女款 復古 花卉 襯衫 休閒 波西米亞風 印花 T 恤 向日葵 野花 圖案 T 恤 女孩 上衣

留言內容: All I can say is this shirt is COMFY. I got it in a size medium. I am 5’6” and 138lbs. The shirt fit perfect and is true to size. I like how soft the material is. The flowers are a cute touch on the front and back of the shirt as well as the folded sleeves. Makes the Tshirt a bit more stylish. I’ve worn this shirt multiple times ready and have thrown it in the regular wash. It washes well without pilling.  Happy with the quality of this shirt!

商品名稱: 女款 復古 花卉 襯衫 休閒 波西米亞風 印花 T 恤 向日葵 野花 圖案 T 恤 女孩 上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 黑色
留言內容: While it looks like a heathered black fabric in the listing, the shirt is actually plain solid black, which cheapens the look a little, IMO. Size Large fits like a U.S. Unisex/Men's Medium t-shirt, with a 40" bust. The cotton-poly blend is not too thin and the length is not excessive. The sleeves have a folded over design. To prevent peeling of the floral design, I would suggest washing this on cold, inside out, and hang dry. No neck tag.

商品名稱: 女款 復古 花卉 襯衫 休閒 波西米亞風 印花 T 恤 向日葵 野花 圖案 T 恤 女孩 上衣

The decals like likely crack and peel, but hey this kind of shirt might look better this way. If you're looking for a looser longer fit t-shirt, and you're a shorter person, this would be that kind of fit. I am 5.1 so this is way to big for me.

留言內容: Its beautiful but the sizing is unrealistic. I'm wearing XXL and it fits me like it's a size medium! Sizing aside, the print is very pretty. For some reason, I thought it was supposed to be embroidery, but the print is iron-on, so be careful to dry it on low heat or better yet, line dry. Size up and you'll be happy.
